title: 求怎样使村民交换带有附加信息的物品？
author: xiaoyuan233
txt_content: 如果知道怎样使交换物品的附加信息带有颜色就更好了，求

replies.author: wei_shao
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: xiaoyuan233
replies.txt_content:
GoodYG 发表于 2016-4-16 10:42
附带村民带颜色是吧，用口令就行 /shopkeeper
不是，使村民交换有附加信息的物品

replies.author: GoodYG
replies.txt_content: 附带村民带颜色是吧，用口令就行 /shopkeeper

replies.author: hqqaazz
replies.txt_content:
这个帖子里有http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-443181-1-1.html

summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~1 ~ ~ wall_sign 5 replace {Text1:"{text:\\"Click\\",clickEvent:{action:\\"run_command\\",value:\\"blockdata ~-1 ~ ~ {Command:summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ {NoAI:1b,Equipment:[{},{},{},{},{id:skull,Damage:3,Count:1,tag:{SkullOwner:songfeitong}}],CustomName:\\\u00a7b\\\u00a7lSOFT,Profession:1,Willing:1,Silent:1b,Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:2147483647,uses:0,buy:{id:minecraft:potato,Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{display:{Name:\\\u00a74PotatoMaster101,Lore:[\\\u00a75PotatoMaster101]}}},buyB:{id:minecraft:diamond,Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{display:{Name:\\\u00a7bCBL,Lore:[0:\\\u00a73CommandBlockLogic,1:\\\u00a7eis A,2:\\\u00a72Great Team]}}},sell:{id:minecraft:sign,Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{display:{Name:\\\u00a73\\\u00a7l\\\u00a7nCBL,Lore:[0:\\\u00a7c?\\\u00a7c?\\\u00a7c?\\\u00a7c? \\\u00a79?\\\u00a79?\\\u00a79?   \\\u00a72?,1:\\\u00a7c?       \\\u00a79?    \\\u00a79? \\\u00a72?,2:\\\u00a7c?       \\\u00a79?\\\u00a79?\\\u00a79?   \\\u00a72?,3:\\\u00a7c?       \\\u00a79?    \\\u00a79? \\\u00a72?,4:\\\u00a7c?\\\u00a7c?\\\u00a7c?\\\u00a7c? \\\u00a79?\\\u00a79?\\\u00a79?   \\\u00a72?\\\u00a72?\\\u00a72?\\\u00a72?,]}}}}]}},}\\"}}"}}}复制代码

replies.txt_content:
wei_shao 发表于 2016-4-16 11:21
改变村民交换的变量或者配置,单人的话可以尝试用R-Au*****
详细一点

replies.author: hqqaazz
replies.txt_content:
/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ 
{Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:1,buy:{id:264,Count:3},sell:{id:267,Count:1,tag:
{ench:[{id:16,lvl:10},{id:17,lvl:10}],
display:{Name:"附魔钻剑",Lore:["附加信息","1","2","3"]}}}},
{maxUses:1,buy:{id:331,Count:1},sell:{id:98,Count:1,Damage:3}},
{maxUses:1,buy:{id:103,Count:1},sell:{id:86,Count:1}},
{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:80,Count:1},sell:{id:79,Count:1}}]}}复制代码

{ench:[{id:16,lvl:10},{id:17,lvl:10}],
display:{Name:"附魔钻剑",Lore:["附加信息","1","2","3"]}}}},

wei_shao 发表于 2016-4-16 12:00
装完第二个插件，你进入服务器
拿着一张纸，你输入/lore name 老人的话
再输入/lore add &4啦啦啦
